Verify that breakpoints are moved appropriately in case of binding removal.


Running: addFileSystem

Running: addNetworkFooJS

Running: setBreakpointInFileSystemUISourceCode
http://127.0.0.1:8000/devtools/persistence/resources/foo.js:3

Running: removeBindingAndDumpBreakpoints
